name: Deep Breath (The Jucas, MaDTrilhas, tinoko, VMRX, bernardexxx, Eduardo Scheffler)
name_original: Deep Breath (The Jucas, MaDTrilhas, tinoko, VMRX, bernardexxx, Eduardo Scheffler)
description:
Game Concept:

 You are an astronaut working on an hostile environment that wishes to take away your last breath. When an unexpected event happens, you are pushed into the vastness of space to your own luck. You can accept your fate, or struggle against it. Use WASD or directional Keys to avoid getting hit by space debris, while you go deeper into the space.

Feedback:

This is the first jam we did as a team. Please feel free to share with us your thoughts on the gameplay and about how we can improve it, as well as any ideas! (:

Tools and Assets:

Game Engine: Unity 2020.3.5f1

Character and Props: MagicaVoxel 

Concepts and VFX: Photoshop, Unity 2020.3.5f1

Sound Assets: Soundly

Music and Sound Design: Cubase 10 and Reaper 69

Credits:

Bernardo Benites - @bernardex - UX/UI and 3D Props 

Eduardo Scheffler - @eduscheffler - Programming

Martina Cera - @tinoko - 3D Props

Matheus Giuseppe MaDTrilhas - @matheus-madtrilhas - Sound Design and Music

Vinicius dos Reis - @vmrx - Concepts, Ambience and Visual Special Effects
